mkr.ant.taskdefs
Class Touch

java.lang.Object
  org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntRef<T>
      org.copalis.mkr.ant.AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch>
          mkr.ant.taskdefs.Touch

public class Touch
extends AntTask<org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch>

Touch a file and/or fileset(s) and/or filelist(s); corresponds to the Unix touch command.

If the file to touch doesn't exist, an empty one is created.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch)

setFile

public Touch setFile(java.io.File val)
Sets a single source file to touch. If the file does not exist an empty file will be created.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch.setFile)

setMillis

public Touch setMillis(long val)
Set the new modification time of file(s) touched in milliseconds since midnight Jan 1 1970. Optional, default=now.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch.setMillis)

setDatetime

public Touch setDatetime(java.lang.String val)
Set the new modification time of file(s) touched in the format "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM or PM" or "MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:SS AM or PM". Optional, default=now.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Touch.setDatetime)

setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper

public Touch setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper(org.apache.tools.ant.RuntimeConfigurable val)
Sets the wrapper to be used for runtime configuration. This method should be used only by the ProjectHelper and Ant internals. It is public to allow helper plugins to operate on tasks, normal tasks should never use it.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.Task.setRuntimeConfigurableWrapper)
